Translations.Text: When ili told Sekv ki DI revealed herein ili dir Ni sekv nur ki ni trov our parents Ki their parents hav doing ne kompren ne direkt
Ekzempl such disbelievers est ti de papag ripet ki ili auxd son vok kompren Surd dumb blind; ili ne kompren
O vi kred mangx bon ajx ni proviz por vi est thankful al DI vi worship Him sol

(Li nur prohibits por vi mangx best mort de themselves human interference) sang viand pork best dedicx al ali than DI. 1 forced mangx these) sen est malic deliberate li ne incurs pek! DI est Forgiver Merciful
Those conceal di revelations scripture cheap sxtof gajn mangx fajr their bellies DI testament NE parol al them TAG Resurrection nor VOL LI purify them! Ili incurred painful retribution
est ili chose straying guidance retribution forgiveness! Consequently ili endure Infer
This est DI revealed this scripture bor truth those disput scripture est plej ardent opponents
